job_config.job_description: [Simplified] Analyze Python code for security vulnerabilities, performance bottlenecks, code quality issues, and testing gaps

agent_config.name: SimpleCodeImprovementWorkflow
agent_config.description: A simplified code improvement workflow with 3 steps: analysis, parallel issue identification, and recommendations.

sub_agents.name: GeneralCodeAnalysisAgent
sub_agents.instruction: Don't do anything, just echo the input.
sub_agents.description: Analyzes code structure and provides architectural overview

sub_agents.name: IssueIdentificationParallel
sub_agents.description: Parallel identification of security and quality issues

sub_agents.name: SecurityAnalyzer
sub_agents.instruction: Don't do anything, just echo the input.
sub_agents.description: Identifies security vulnerabilities and defensive measures

sub_agents.name: QualityAnalyzer
sub_agents.instruction: Don't do anything, just echo the input.
sub_agents.description: Identifies code quality and performance issues

sub_agents.name: RecommendationSynthesizer
sub_agents.instruction: Echo the input twice, don't do anything else.

template_config.template_description: Jinja2 template for generating code analysis queries with dynamic content

file_name.description: Array of file names being analyzed

file_type.description: Array of file types corresponding to each file

file_content.description: Array of file contents corresponding to each file

default: Code quality issues and maintainability improvements
